ai-tha-ap249:1.2_0: the supreme person’s hard to find.
ai-tha-ap249:1.3_0: I’ve gained just a single elements,
ai-tha-ap249:2.2_0: on the path that leads to quenching,
ai-tha-ap249:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap249:3.4_0: The fruit element, the fruit element.
ai-tha-ap249:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap249:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
ai-tha-ap249:6.1_0: The seventh element, the senior monks of Ātumā.
